conclusion: Analyze trajectory of A, arrangement of blocks, and effects of collision and deflection.
A is moving from the right side towards the group of blocks, direction is diagonal from bottom right to top left.
First block A will encounter is the blue block near the center of the image.
Upon colliding with the blue block, A will likely experience a deflection.
After deflection from blue block, A's trajectory leads towards the orange block above the blue block.
Collision with the orange block will further alter A's trajectory.
Following second deflection, A likely moves towards larger green block at top left and stops.
A will collide with the blue block, then the orange block, and finally stop at the green block.
